comparison_summary: Week 2 shows a marked improvement in most performance metrics compared to Week 1, with increases in sessions, pageviews, transactions, and revenue. However, the average session duration decreased slightly, and user-related metrics like the number of users and new users saw a small decline. The bounce rate and conversion rate improved significantly in Week 2, indicating better user engagement and effectiveness in converting users.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Sessions
key_metrics_comparison.description: Week 2 saw an increase in average sessions to 1682.57 compared to 1543.43 in Week 1, an improvement of approximately 9%.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: The average number of users slightly decreased in Week 2 to 1237.86 from 1265.14 in Week 1, showing a marginal decline.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average New Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: There was a small decline in new users, with Week 2 averaging 424.14 compared to 427.29 in Week 1.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Pageviews
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average pageviews increased by approximately 11% in Week 2, moving from 6225.86 to 6891.71.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Pages per Session
key_metrics_comparison.description: Pages per session slightly increased from 4.01 in Week 1 to 4.07 in Week 2, indicating a modest improvement in user engagement.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Session Duration
key_metrics_comparison.description: The average session duration decreased slightly, with Week 2 at 153.88 seconds compared to 163.1 seconds in Week 1.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Bounce Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Bounce rate improved significantly in Week 2, dropping to 16.06% from 20% in Week 1.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Conversion Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Conversion rate increased notably from 2.8% in Week 1 to 4.25% in Week 2, indicating better conversion effectiveness.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Transactions
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average transactions rose significantly by about 45%, from 34.14 in Week 1 to 49.43 in Week 2.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Revenue
key_metrics_comparison.description: Average revenue increased substantially by about 28.6%, from $1622.53 in Week 1 to $2087.17 in Week 2.
